## MEP.randomChromosome() method

Returns a new random [MEPChromosome](./gp.mepchromosome.md) with the configured probabilities of operator and terminal nodes (constants).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
randomChromosome(): MEPChromosome<OP, T>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`MEPChromosome<OP, T>`

## Remarks

See [MEP.decodeChromosome()](./gp.mep.decodechromosome.md) for conversion to [ASTNode](./gp.astnode.md)<!-- -->s.
